title: MAFS' Tamara Joy flaunts her peachy assets on holiday in Cambodia
text:
She recently made headlines after unveiling her brand new nose.

And former MAFS star Tamara Joy has raised eyebrows yet again, this time by stripping completely nude and posing on her hotel balcony while holidaying in Siem Reap, Cambodia.

On Wednesday, the 30-year-old brunette bombshell took to Instagram to flaunt her pert derriere in the almost too-rude snap.

Morning, sweet cheeks! On Wednesday, Married At First Sight's Tamara Joy, 30, (pictured) took to Instagram to flaunt her pert derriere in a cheeky nude snap while on holiday in Siem Reap, Cambodia

In the revealing holiday postcard, Tamara was seen proudly posing against the railing of her hotel balcony in nothing but a pair of fluttering false eyelashes.

She stood cross-legged, as her luscious locks cascaded down her back in loose curls.

The voluptuous beauty looked like she didn't have a care in the world as she showed off her jaw-dropping silhouette.

Fancy a paddle? Earlier this month, Tamara unveiled her new nose on Instagram for the first time after undergoing a rhinoplasty procedure to reshape her sniffer.

Quoting famous drag queen RuPaul in the caption, Tamara wrote: 'It’s important to remember you’re born naked, and the rest is drag.'

Earlier this month, Tamara unveiled her new nose on Instagram for the first time after undergoing a rhinoplasty procedure to reshape her sniffer.

The headline grabber wrote in the caption: 'This one is for all you nosy people. I have had heaps of DM's asking me about my recent surgery so here it is!'

Perfection: Earlier this month, the headline grabber wrote, 'This one is for all you nosy people. I have had heaps of DM's asking me about my recent surgery so here it is!'

The Bali-based socialite added proudly: 'Yes I have had a nose job and yes I love it.'

Judging by her current appearance, the rhinoplasty has made a huge difference to the star's look.

The tip of her nose appears to have been lifted, while her bridge has been straightened and filled out.

Tamara is no stranger to cosmetic enhancements, having previously undergone a breast enlargement and lip fillers.
description: She recently made headlines after unveiling her brand new nose.
authors: Shannon Shipley For Daily Mail Australia
